text: August Krogh (Schack August Steenberg Krogh, 15 November 1874 13 September 1949) was a Danish zoologist. He won the 1920 Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine, for his discoveries about capillaries. ==Related pages== *List of biologists == References == Category:1874 births Category:1949 deaths Category:Danish biologists Category:Danish Nobel Prize winners Category:Zoologists
title: August Krogh
